reference.title: cxxFunctionAPIItemLocation
reference.shortdesc: Describes the location of a function in the original C++ source code.

section.title: Description
section.p: Describes the location of a function in the original C++ source code.

example.title: Example
example.p: Then function g would have the cxxFunctionAPIItemLocation element:
example.codeblock: <cxxFunctionAPIItemLocation> <cxxFunctionDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="inc/a.h"/> <cxxFunctionDeclarationFileLine name="lineNumber" value="5"/> <cxxFunctionDefinitionFile name="filePath" value="src/a.cpp"/> <cxxFunctionDefinitionFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="4"/> <cxxFunctionDefinitionFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="7"/> </cxxFunctionAPIItemLocation>
